metadata.title: CVE-2017-0841 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A remote code execution vulnerability in the Android system (libutils).Product: Android. Versions: 5.0.2, 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2,8.0. Android ID: A-37723026.

criterions.comment: android-platform-system-core: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
